backend/main.mo: Defines types and maps for clients, documents, user profiles, threads, patterns, and financial records, with role-based helpers and integrated storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file and page.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining light/dark theme color variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and linking the favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main routing and authentication flow setup including profile gating, dashboard layout, and module routes.
frontend/src/auth/permissions.ts: Defines capability sets for each business role and utilities for checking permissions and visible modules.
frontend/src/auth/roles.ts: Declares business role types and a normalizer mapping extended role strings to valid roles.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserManage: User management page gated by permissions with basic layout and an empty state for user administration.
frontend/src/components/auth/PermissionG: Checks user capability and conditionally renders or disables children based on permissions.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a profile setup form and saves user details using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Renders an Internet Identity login screen with status handling and error alerts.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientUp: Modal for creating or editing a client with PAN validation and client mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/common/BackendEr: Shows an alert banner for backend errors, highlighting authentication-related issues.
frontend/src/components/common/EmptyStat: Displays an empty state card with optional illustration, text, and action content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's profile using the actor and exposes loading state and refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identities, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/usePermissions.ts: Computes the user’s role and capabilities from their profile and exposes permission helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of query and mutation hooks for profiles, clients, documents, and margin snapshots using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind config with custom color variables, dark mode values, and utility classes for badges, tables, and monospace font.
frontend/src/layout/DashboardLayout.tsx: Main dashboard layout providing sidebar navigation, user menu, and role-based visible modules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
Audit log viewer with search, export (permission‑gated), and a table of immutable system events.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientManagem: Client management interface with search, bulk upload sample, empty state message, and client creation modal.
frontend/src/pages/compliance/Regulatory: Provides a calendar and list view for regulatory deadlines with permission‑gated actions and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/config/ConfigurationH: Displays configuration categories like exchanges, users, and integrations, gated by manage_config permissions.
frontend/src/pages/config/ExchangeSettin: Shows exchange configuration settings with a back button and an empty state for connected exchanges.
frontend/src/pages/config/IntegrationsPa: Lists external integrations with an alert note and an empty state for configuring KRA, depositories, and accounting systems.
frontend/src/pages/data-entry/TradeImpor: Supports trade import via file upload, manual entry, and history, with permission‑controlled tabs and sample download.
frontend/src/pages/HowToUseGuidePage.tsx: Scrollable guide page explaining platform onboarding, roles, permissions, and module usage.
frontend/src/pages/margin/MarginCollater: Displays margin metrics, snapshot data, and collateral tabs with dynamic loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/OverviewPage.tsx: Dashboard overview showing key metrics, quick actions, alerts, and link to the how‑to guide.
frontend/src/pages/reconciliation/BankRe: Allows bank statement uploads, shows reconciliation runs, and includes sample download and required columns info.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ReportLibrary: Provides searchable report templates, scheduled reports navigation, and report generation actions based on permissions.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ReportWizardP: Shows a simple report generation wizard entry screen with template selection placeholder.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ScheduledRepo: Renders the Scheduled Reports page with navigation, permission-gated actions, and an empty state for automated report schedules.
frontend/src/pages/surveillance/Surveill: Displays surveillance alert metrics and tabbed alert categories, each showing empty states when no alerts exist.
frontend/src/utils/export.ts: Provides CSV and JSON export utilities that generate downloadable files from supplied data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, with support for hash-based routing.
frontend/src/validation/pan.ts: Validates PAN numbers using a simple regex pattern.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, goals, architecture notes, and implemented features for a compliance-focused dashboard.
